Document Quantity Total
This module will add the sum of quantities of line items for orders.

Quantity Total on Transactions

  • Sale Order
  • Purchase Order
  • Delivery Order/Receipt/Internal Transfer
  • Customer Invoice/Vendor Bill

Quantity Total on Reports

  • Print Quotation/Sale Order
  • Print RFQ/Purchase Order
  • Print Delivery Order
  • Print Customer Invoice/Vendor Bill
Sale Order

Purchase Order

Delivery Order
